original_title: Marking 4th year of Easter Sunday mayhem
original_body_lines: The Catholic community in Negombo staged an all-night vigil to mark the fourth year of the deadly Easter Sunday suicide attacks last evening called for unveiling the truth behind the carnage. The protest march commenced from St. Sebastian’s Church in Katuwapitiya is expected to reach Colombo by early morning today. Pix by Nisal Baduge
